Interface Client

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractClient, ClientImpl, ClientPoolImpl
public interface Client
A Client allows Jobs to be enqueued for execution by Workers.
Author:
Greg Haines, Animesh Kumar

  • Method Details

    • enqueue

      void enqueue(String queue, Job job)
      Queues a job in a given queue to be run.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to add the Job to
      job - the job to be enqueued
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty or if the job is null

    • batchEnqueue

      void batchEnqueue(String queue, List<Job> jobs)
      Queues jobs in a given queue to be run. Consider splitting long lists of jobs into chunks of 10,000 or so.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to add the Job to
      jobs - the jobs to be enqueued
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty or if the list of jobs is null
      See Also:
      • Redis Pipelining
      • Important Note: Split at 10k jobs

    • priorityEnqueue

      void priorityEnqueue(String queue, Job job)
      Queues a job with high priority in a given queue to be run.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to add the Job to
      job - the job to be enqueued
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty or if the job is null

    • end

      void end()
      Quits the connection to the Redis server.

    • acquireLock

      boolean acquireLock(String lockName, String lockHolder, Duration timeout)
      Acquire a non-blocking distributed lock. Calling this method again renews the lock.
      Parameters:
      lockName - the name of the lock to acquire
      lockHolder - a unique string identifying the caller
      timeout - how long until the lock will expire, truncated to seconds
      Returns:
      true, if the lock was acquired, false otherwise

    • delayedEnqueue

      void delayedEnqueue(String queue, Job job, Instant future)
      Queues a job in a given queue to be run in the future.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to add the Job to
      job - the job to be enqueued
      future - point in time when the job will run
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty, if the job is null or if the timestamp is not in the future

    • removeDelayedEnqueue

      void removeDelayedEnqueue(String queue, Job job)
      Removes a queued future job.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to remove the Job from
      job - the job to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty, if the job is null

    • recurringEnqueue

      void recurringEnqueue(String queue, Job job, Instant future, Duration frequency)
      Queues a job to be in the future and recur
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to add the Job too
      job - the job to be enqueued
      future - point in time when the job will run
      frequency - how often the job will run
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty, if the job is null

    • removeRecurringEnqueue

      void removeRecurringEnqueue(String queue, Job job)
      Removes a queued recurring job.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to remove the Job from
      job - the job to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the queue is null or empty, if the job is null
